alert.note: Alert for Austin; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 9:32PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Austin, northwestern Galveston, Fort Bend, north central Brazoria, west central Chambers, southern Waller and central Harris Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 926 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Conroe to Lake Houston to Liberty. Movement was south at 35 mph. An outflow boundary racing ahead of the storms was pushing southwest. Expect elevated winds to be observed both ahead of and within the line of storms. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Pearland, League City, Sugar Land, Baytown, Missouri City, Friendswood, La Porte, Deer Park, Rosenberg, Alvin, Stafford, South Houston, Bellaire, West University Place, Katy, Seabrook, Richmond, Galena Park and Jacinto City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Waller
